review:
I highly recommend Heaton & Associates! Jared Herling is my attorney. I've never worked with such a professional, caring person! He did a wonderful job for my case. He also helped me with my WC case! He responds quickly, is thorough and pays attention to every detail of my case Jared is an
awesome attorney !
